Deficientes visuais: saiba como ferramen: Visually impaired: learn how tools can help you promote equity in your company
Investir em ferramentas para deficientes: Investing in tools for visually impaired is essential to achieve social equality. After all, they allow this group to explore their full potential without limits. So, see what they are, understand how essential they are in everyday life and work.
Deficientes visuais são aqueles que tive: Visually impaired are those who have had partial or total loss of vision. This can be the result of various factors such as glaucoma, cataracts, injuries, and others. Additionally, they can be divided into three groups:
cegueira legal: possuem 20/200 ou menos: legal blindness: have 20/200 or less in the better eye;
baixa visão: mesmo com uso de óculos ou: low vision: even with glasses or lens, they do not see well;
cegueira total: não têm percepção visual: total blindness: have no visual perception.
É essencial saber que a deficiência visu: It is essential to know that visual impairment does not prevent a person from having a normal life. In other words, they can build a career, family, and have leisure like anyone else.
Outro ponto relevante é que quando esses: Another relevant point is that when these individuals are part of an inclusive team, they help improve results significantly. However, for this, they need access to appropriate items.
Por que é crucial oferecer ferramentas p: Why is it crucial to offer tools for visually impaired?
Oferecer ferramentas apropriadas para de: Providing appropriate tools for visually impaired helps promote inclusion and equality. This is because they make it possible for everyone to participate in daily activities. Additionally, there are other relevant points:
Ao investir em itens adequados, a sua em: By investing in suitable items, your company is complying with the law. After all, Law No. 13,146 of July 6, 2015, defines that promoting equality conditions is mandatory for every company.
Stevie Wonder, Andrea Bocelli e Helen Ke: Stevie Wonder, Andrea Bocelli, and Helen Keller are individuals who have proven their talent throughout history. Thus, they have shown that with the right tools, it is possible to shine and leave a great legacy in the world.
Quais são as melhores ferramentas para d: What are the best tools for visually impaired?
O leitor de tela é uma ótima ferramenta: Screen reader is a great tool for visually impaired. This is because it is a software that converts displayed text into audio or braille. But also others, such as:
Todos os itens citados tem o poder de ot: All mentioned items have the power to optimize the routine of people with disabilities who are part of this group. But for this to be clearer, see how each of them works just below.
Os ampliadores de tela, como o próprio n: Screen magnifiers, as the name suggests, are used to increase the size of letters. Thus, people with low vision or legal blindness can perform their tasks with them.
É bom saber que eles funcionam tanto em: It's good to know that they work on both computers and other mobile devices, such as a cell phone or tablet. So, you'll be able to implement them in your company without difficulty.
No mercado, já existem teclados e displa: In the market, there are already keyboards and displays with an ideal design for people with blindness. Thus, they have high contrast and undulations. In addition, they have a protection that makes the piece last longer.
O padrão das letras é a ABNT e eles são: The standard of the letters is ABNT and they are plugged with a USB cable. Therefore, it is a piece that follows the standard and is easy to install.
Hoje em dia, existem películas que torna: Nowadays, there are films that make keys tactile on cell phones and tablets. Therefore, they contain small bubbles that dynamically inflate to aid agility and practicality.
The piece is not yet for sale in Brazil. Therefore, if you want, you will have to search for it on international sales websites. In addition, it does not adapt to computers, which is a downside for companies.
Por ser uma boa ideia, é provável que el: Because it is a good idea, it is likely to be embraced by the national market and adapted to other items. So, it's worth paying attention to buy it when it becomes available in Brazil.
O relógio inteligente faz com que o indi: The smartwatch allows the individual to send and read messages. Thus, it is great for those who need to send a quick response about a project or meeting.
Outro fator relevante é que ele ajuda a: Another relevant factor is that it helps monitor physical activities. So, if your company likes to promote health and well-being, it can be ideal. Besides, in general, it is compatible with Android and iOS.
A luva robótica ajuda a “ver” com as mão: The robotic glove helps to see with hands. This is because this device has cameras that describe the environment. Thus, when entering a meeting room, for example, it will be able to have the same spatial awareness as anyone else.
O encaixe é ergonômico e a peça é muito: The fit is ergonomic and the piece is very easy to use. Therefore, visually impaired individuals will be able to use it without difficulty, which will bring a significant improvement in quality of life.
É essencial saber que essa é uma peça de: It is essential to know that this is a high-tech piece that will make a big difference for the company. After all, it will show the team that the well-being of each one is crucial. Thus, it will show everyone that they are in the right place.
Quais os maiores desafios para os defici: What are the biggest challenges for visually impaired people at work?
O acesso a dados é um dos maiores desafi: Access to data is one of the biggest challenges for visually impaired people at work. This is because, to this day, many companies do not have suitable items for this group. In addition, there are other problems, such as:
falta de estrutura com conforto e segura: lack of infrastructure with comfort and security;
exclusão por parte do time ou clientes;: exclusion by the team or clients;
falta de qualificação profissional forne: lack of professional qualification provided by the company.
Apesar da sociedade já ter evoluído, ain: Despite society having already evolved, there is still a daily struggle to change all the points mentioned. In addition, it is worth mentioning that everyone should join the cause.
É dever das empresas investir na acessib: It is the duty of companies to invest in accessibility continuously. By doing so, it will be possible to ensure a better and more inclusive world for everyone. In fact, one way to achieve this goal is to provide all or a large part of the items that have been discussed.

text4: Does the actor in Anatomy of a Fall really have visual impairment? Director was impressed with 'the way Milo spoke'
text5: Parassinfônica Orchestra ends 2023 season at Sala São Paulo
Ator de Anatomia de Uma Queda realmente: Does the actor in Anatomy of a Fall really have visual impairment? Director was impressed with the way Milo spoke.
Descrição da Imagem: personagem milo dep: Image Description: Milo's character giving a statement, featured image representing Anatomy of a Fall
Uma das maiores produções do ano,: One of the biggest productions of the year,
já está disponível no streaming. Dirigid: is now available for streaming. Directed by Justine Triet, the Oscar-winning production for Best Original Screenplay at the 96th awards is starred by
O suspense tem início quando um homem é: The suspense begins when a man is found dead in the snow outside the isolated chalet where he lived with his wife Sandra (Hüller), a German writer, and their 11-year-old visually impaired son. The investigation concludes it to be a "suspicious death": it's impossible to know for sure if he took his own life or was murdered. The widow is indicted, with her own son caught in the middle of the conflict: between judgment and family life, doubts weigh heavily on the mother-son relationship, as the boy is the only witness to what happened.
Com uma performance brilhante, o intérpr: With a brilliant performance, the interpreter of Daniel, the protagonist's son, drew attention for his dedication to the role. In an interview with The Wrap, the film's director revealed that Milo's audition was quite similar to casting for Steven Spielberg's E.T. - The Extra-Terrestrial.
Durante o processo de escalação, a diret: During the casting process, the director addressed that many questioned the content of the young actor's lines. 'Everyone told us: 'This script really doesn't work because a child doesn't talk like that.' I said: 'Huh? My 8-year-old daughter talks like that. It's definitely possible,' which ended up being proven with the project's execution.
Ela mencionou que, apesar de ter pensado: She mentioned that, although she had thought about an actor with visual impairment, something that would fit the character, she was enchanted by a certain aspect of Milo, who is not blind. Still, the artist wasn't the first choice because he didn't resemble Sandra so much. However, her producer carefully watched his test tape and asked Justine to just listen to the recording. 'The way Milo spoke was different,' she remembered. 'It didn't sound like a child, and I really liked that about him.'
Na audição, Milo foi convidado a fazer u: In the audition, Milo was asked to do one of the film's scenes, in fact: 'And in 10 seconds,' Triet recalled, 'he became completely different, totally into the character. He had tears all over his face, actually.
Ela completa: \"E naquele momento pedi a: She finishes: 'And at that moment I asked him to say his character's lines at the end of the film, which no one had done perfectly for me before. And he did the whole scene, right there, right in front of us. We were so impressed,' she remembered. 'It was so complex all the things that were happening to him at that moment. But he made it all seem so easy.
Anatomia de uma Queda está disponível no: Anatomy of a Fall is available in the Prime Video catalog.

Odrus, grafiteiro surdo, em frente a uma: Odrus, deaf graffiti artist, in front of one of his works
O grafiteiro Odrus, nome artístico de Ra: Graffiti artist Odrus, whose real name is Rafael Caldeira dos Santos, revealed in an interview that art was fundamental in transforming his life. At 40, he shares his story of overcoming and how artistic expression rescued him from a past of anger and lack of perspective.
Vindo de um contexto de exclusão social: Coming from a context of social exclusion and facing physical and sensory limitations, Odrus went through difficult periods in his adolescence, including stays in rehabilitation centers due to his involvement in assaults. He mentions that art not only saved him, but also aims to inspire other people with hearing impairments and those facing similar challenges.
\"Venho da periferia, de juventude de mu: "I come from the periphery, from a youth of many hardships, suffering prejudice and living in a time when there were few Libras interpreters. I went down a wrong path, but art saved me. Now, I want to show that through it, we can be whatever we want," said Odrus, who expresses himself through Brazilian Sign Language (Libras).
Odrus é conhecido por incluir sinais em: Odrus is known for including Libras signs in some of his graffiti, making his work accessible and inspiring for more deaf people. He began his artistic journey over 20 years ago, introduced to Hip Hop culture and graffiti by a friend.
\"Julgavam muito o que eu fazia. Mas, co: "They judged a lot what I did. But, as I believed, I had the patience to show that what I produce is art. It took rolling up my sleeves and not giving up," he added, reflecting on the challenges he faced at the beginning of his career.
Atualmente, Odrus vive de encomendas de: Currently, Odrus lives off orders for graffiti works, mainly to illustrate facades of shops and schools in Brasília, where he lives. In addition, he shares his talent through workshops at Fundação Casa, seeking to provide new transformative opportunities with art for minorities and people in vulnerable situations.
Seu trabalho está sendo destacado na exp: His work is being highlighted at the exhibition "Beyond the Streets, Stories of Graffiti" at Itaú Cultural, in São Paulo, until July 30th. The exhibition features works by 50 graffiti artists and is an important opportunity for deaf people to see Odrus as a model of overcoming and inspiration.

Orquestra parassinfônica fará sua estrei: Parasymphonic Orchestra will make its debut at Sala São Paulo
A Opesp, Orquestra Parassinfônica de São: Opesp, São Paulo Parasymphonic Orchestra, is preparing for its debut at Sala São Paulo on December 3, coinciding with the International Day of Persons with Disabilities. Composed of 32 musicians, almost half of them with disabilities, the orchestra was formed through a call for talents.
Desde outubro, os músicos têm participad: Since October, the musicians have been participating in intensive rehearsals for the debut, which will be conducted by maestro Roberto Tibiriçá. The initiative was conceived by Igor Cayres, a cultural producer inspired by musicians like João Carlos Martins and groups like the blind women's choir, aiming to highlight artists with disabilities in prominent roles in music.
Um dos músicos da Opesp é Miriã Vitória: One of Opesp's musicians is Miriã Vitória dos Santos, who found a passion for music since childhood and now plays cello in the orchestra. Diagnosed with cerebral palsy at the age of 2, Miriã sees her participation in Opesp as a milestone in representation and professionalization in music.
O futuro da Opesp inclui mais apresentaç: Opesp's future includes more performances in 2023 and the opening of new calls to integrate more musicians with disabilities into the project, promoting diversity in classical music.

Confira alguns dos instrumentos que ensi: Check out some of the instruments we teach!
A guitarra é um instrumento versátil, c: The guitar is a versatile instrument capable of expressing a wide range of emotions. In addition, through teaching, we also cultivate strong technical skills and musical knowledge.
O violão é composto de um corpo de madei: The acoustic guitar consists of a wooden body that amplifies the produced music, and has six or more strings, mostly made of steel, which are played with fingers or using picks.
O piano é composto por um corpo de madei: The piano consists of a wooden body that amplifies the produced music. It has keys that, when pressed, trigger hammers to strike the strings.
